author: Simon Difford
description: Anita has a problem - she's indecisive when it comes to choosing base spirits.
name: Anita's Attitude Adjuster
recipeIngredient: 15 ml White (charcoal-filtered) 1-4 year old light rum
15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE first seven ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass
TOP with champagne and gently stir
